title: UK Crime Thrillers Box - Ely North - DCI Finnegan Series: Books 1 - 3 ( Yorkshire crime thrillers! ) Kindle Edition | hotukdeals
text: Get This Free While You Can - Fantastic Reviews On This Series Of Thrillers - Paperback \u00a324.99 If you enjoy gritty crime dramas, such as Happy Valley, Line Of Duty, and Luther, then check this series out. Enter the world of DCI Frank Finnegan and his team of stalwart police officers.A murder, mystery, crime thriller series set in the rugged and atmospheric landscape of North Yorkshire. Book 1 \u2013 Black Nab : an unsolved murder; a string of armed robberies on petrol stations, and two teenage girls who go missing from a deserted beach in broad daylight. As DCI Finnegan and his team unravel the different mysteries, they eventually conclude there could be a link between them\u2026 but what? Book 2 \u2013 Jawbone Walk : when a local schoolteacher is discovered tied to a rock off the coast of Whitby, DCI Finnegan and his team realise the brutal killing is designed to send a message. But to whom? As the body count rises, Finnegan knows he\u2019s hunting for a pair of ruthless killers. When DI Kumar, one of his top officers, disappears while escorting a suspect back to Whitby, it appears the hunters have become the hunted. Book 3 \u2013 Vertigo Alley : after an elderly hiker fails to return home after a weekend walking trip in the Yorkshire Dales, it\u2019s initially treated as a missing persons case. But DCI Finnegan thinks something is not quite right and puts his brightest officer, DI Kumar, onto the investigation. Meanwhile DS Stoker is undercover on a drugs operation in the company of a disagreeable detective sergeant seconded from Police Scotland. As both cases intersect, Frank and his team realise there\u2019s something rotten in the heart of the Yorkshire Dales.
